scripts.build: parcel build src/index.ts --target node --out-dir build --no-cache --no-minify && tsc --outDir build --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly && rm -rf build/_demo
scripts.local: yarn build && yalc publish && yalc push
scripts.yalc-link: yalc link @fidanjs/runtime & yalc link @fidanjs/jsx & yalc link @fidanjs/babel-plugin-fidan-jsx
